definitions.text: the phenomenon of a propagating wave (light or sound) being thrown back from a surface

examples: tears are an expression of grief
the pulse is a reflection of the heart's condition

definitions.text: a likeness in which left and right are reversed
the image of something as reflected by a mirror (or other reflective material)
examples: he studied his reflection in the mirror

definitions.text: (mathematics) a transformation in which the direction of one axis is reversed
the ability to reflect beams or rays
